class.name: Phaser.TimerEvent

parameters.name: timer
parameters.help: The Timer object that this TimerEvent belongs to.

parameters.name: delay
parameters.help: The delay in ms at which this TimerEvent fires.

parameters.name: tick
parameters.help: The tick is the next game clock time that this event will fire at.

parameters.name: repeatCount
parameters.help: If this TimerEvent repeats it will do so this many times.

parameters.name: loop
parameters.help: True if this TimerEvent loops, otherwise false.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.help: The callback that will be called when the TimerEvent occurs.

parameters.name: callbackContext
parameters.help: The context in which the callback will be called.

parameters.name: arguments
parameters.help: The values to be passed to the callback.

class.help: A TimerEvent is a single event that is processed by a Phaser.Timer.\nIt consists of a delay, which is a value in milliseconds after which the event will fire.\nIt can call a specific callback, passing in optional parameters.

public.name: arguments
public.inlineHelp: The values to be passed to the callback.

public.name: callback
public.inlineHelp: The callback that will be called when the TimerEvent occurs.

public.name: callbackContext
public.inlineHelp: The context in which the callback will be called.

public.name: delay
public.inlineHelp: The delay in ms at which this TimerEvent fires.

public.name: loop
public.inlineHelp: True if this TimerEvent loops, otherwise false.

public.name: repeatCount
public.inlineHelp: If this TimerEvent repeats it will do so this many times.

public.name: tick
public.inlineHelp: The tick is the next game clock time that this event will fire at.

public.name: timer
public.inlineHelp: The Timer object that this TimerEvent belongs to.

protected.name: pendingDelete
protected.inlineHelp: A flag that controls if the TimerEvent is pending deletion.
